sentences.cn: 黑色的出租车使用柴油。
在有些地方，柴油卖到每加仑60便士。

sentences.en: Diesel exhaust is particularly aggravating to many susceptible individuals.
sentences.cn: 许多体质敏感的人尤其反感柴油废气。

sentences.en: Fuels for diesel engines may be considered under two broad headings.
sentences.cn: 用作柴油机的燃料可以分两大类.

sentences.en: I drank a cup of tea that tasted of diesel.
sentences.cn: 我喝了杯有股柴油味的茶。

sentences.en: My tractor operates on diesel oil.
sentences.cn: 我的那台拖拉机用柴油开动.

sentences.en: One car in ten sold was a diesel.
sentences.cn: 销售的小汽车中有十分之一是柴油车.

sentences.en: Our new car is a diesel.
She put diesel fuel, instead of petrol, into the tank causing the motor to seize up.
sentences.cn: 她往油箱里加了些柴油而不是汽油，致使发动机发生故障。

sentences.en: Steam locomotives were superseded by diesel.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽机车被内燃机车取代了.

sentences.en: The air is so black with diesel fumes and coal dust, I can barely see.
sentences.cn: 空气中充斥着柴油烟雾和煤尘粉末，黑乎乎的，我几乎什么都看不见。

sentences.en: The GM diesel engine shunted the coaches to Platform 4.
sentences.cn: 通用柴油动力火车头将车厢转轨到了4号月台。

sentences.en: The steam locomotive has been superseded by the diesel locomotive.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽机车被柴油机车取代了.

sentences.en: There are several reasons for this swing toward diesel engines.
sentences.cn: 这种向柴油发动机方向的发展有几个原因.

sentences.en: To one side are four small diesel engines for driving the generators.
sentences.cn: 在一侧有四台驱动发电机的小型柴油机.

sentences.en: We experimented with diesel engines to drive the pumps.
sentences.cn: 我们试着用柴油机来带动水泵.

phrases.tran_cn: 柴油机油，柴油机用润滑油
柴油发电厂，柴油机发电厂
柴油泵；柴油机组泵；柴油机驱动泵

trans.tran_cn: 内燃机传动的；供内燃机用的
